name: Unreal Lust Theory
description:
Be the part of this game development! Your feedback and participation is most valuable in creating the Unreal Lust Theory world! Tell us what you think, test out the mechanics and sex scenes, and with your help expect more and MORE to come! Please keep in mind that this is a Early access game more content is coming soon.




Dive into a captivating virtual realm where fantasies come alive in "Unreal Lust Theory". Based on the original AVN "Lust Theory," this game masterfully blends sensuality and storytelling, providing an experience that resonates with your refined tastes. Prepare to be swept away by a narrative that delves into the deepest recesses of desire, all within a captivating virtual realm.

WARNING!

This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.
